colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI KHAL KHA DZA SAG THU RGYAL PO MA nI BADZRA NAS RIN CHEN GNYIS PA'I MAndAL BCAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DAM PA'I MTSAN GYIS BYIN GYIS RLABS PA SH'AKYA'I DGE TSUL BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS RANG SNANG GANG 'DOD DU SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI KHU BO CHOS RJE MKHAN PO YE SHES DGE LEGS SO,, ,,RMAD 'BYUNG @002B RNAM THAR GTZANG MA'I KHRIMS DANG LDAN, ,RLABS CHEN RGYAL SRAS SPYOD PA'I SNYING STOBS CHE, ,BDE STONG MCHOG GI RIM GNYIS RNAL 'BYOR SPYOD, ,BLO BZANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN DANG MJAL BAR SHOG ,'DI KUN GZIGS LNGA BA CHEN PO'I GSUNGS YIN NO, ,CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA, ,CHOS TSUL RNAM PAR 'PHEL BA LA, ,BGEGS KYI MTSAN MA ZHI BA DANG, ,MTHUN RKYEN MA LUS MTSANG BAR SHOG ,BDAG DANG GZHAN GYI DUS GSUM DANG, ,'BREL BA'I @003A *, ,TSOGS GNYIS LA BRTEN NAS, ,RGYAL BA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA YI, ,BSTAN PA YUN RING 'BAR GYUR CIG ,'DI PAn CHEN BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA'I GSUNG YIN NO,, ,TA DYA TH'A, AOm PANYTZA GRI YA AA WA BO DHA NI SV'A H'A, 'DI SMON LAM GYI RJES LA BTON NA SMON LAM BTAB TSAD GRUB PAR MDO LAS GSUNGS SO, ,DGE SLONG CHOS 'DZIN GYIS PAR DU SGRUBS, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,
